text: Tune in Tomorrow is a 1990 American Bermudian comedy movies directed by Jon Amiel and is based on the 1977 novel Aunt Julia and the Scriptwriter by Mario Vargas Llosa. It stars Keanu Reeves, Peter Falk, Barbara Hershey, Dedee Pfeiffer, Patricia Clarkson, Buck Henry, Peter Gallagher, John Larroquette, Elizabeth McGovern and was distributed by Cinecom Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Amazon Category:1990 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Bermudian movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies directed by Jon Amiel
title: Tune in Tomorrow
